answers.answer: I have had protein off and on throughout my pregnancy with pre-eclampsia in labor with my first. My midwife told me that unless there is an issue with my BP, all is OK.  Eat more protein and drink a Crap ton of water. Like 8 bottles or more a day.
I just found this out today too. I'm 14 weeks. Got told I'm dehydrated and to drink more water

question: Im 15 weeks pregnant i just received my urine test result i have one (+)plus in my urine.Does anyone had the same problem in pregnancy, what i should do?(On my first pregnancy i had preeclampsia this is my second pregnancy)
title: Protein in urine
